headline: PNC (PNC) Earnings Surge 30.3%—Profit Growth Reinforces Bullish Narratives on Valuation Upside
summary: PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) posted impressive results, with earnings surging 30.3% over the past year, far outpacing its 5-year annual average of 7.2%. Net profit margins climbed to 28.3% from 23.1% last year. The share price currently stands at $182.34, notably below the estimated fair value of $308.21. Forecasts call for earnings to grow at 5.35% per year and revenue to increase by 5.1% per year, a touch slower than the broader US market’s outlook. With a track record of consistent...

headline: PNC Q3 Deep Dive: Commercial Deposit Surge, Branch Expansion, and Margin Headwinds
summary: Financial services giant PNC (NYSE:PNC) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.9% year on year to $5.92 billion. Its GAAP profit of $4.35 per share was 7.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
